mapper.insert: insert into product(product_no, product_name, product_price, image_file_name, product_type, origin_file_name) values((select nvl(max(product_no) + 1, 1) from product), #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{imageFileName}, #{productType}, #{originFileName})
mapper.select: select * from product order by product_no desc
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{productName}, product_price=#{productPrice}, product_type=#{productType}, image_file_name=#{imageFileName} where product_no = #{productNo}
